page.title: 13BROUGHTY FERRY - POLITICS
page.content: At one time Broughty Ferry was responsible for the administration of many of its own affairs such as{ {Housing, Roads and Health.}The situation changed so that today there are a number of tiers of Government dealing with local, regional and national politics. {LOCAL}In District Council elections Broughty Ferry qualifies for 4 councillors and today (August 1985) they are Kenneth Guild (SNP) David Carus (SDP) Jenny Allen and Charles Barton (both Conservative). { {REGIONAL }This area has 2 Regional Councillors - Gordon Watson and Bruce Mackie. {NATIONAL}Gordon Wilson (SNP) has been the M.P. for this area for 11 years, one of two SNP M.P.s at Westminster.
